oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Comparative transcriptome analysis of rutabaga (Brassica napus) cultivars in response to Plasmodiophora brassicae
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Zhou, Qinqin
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Expression data of rutabagas ('Laurentian' and 'Wilhemsburger') in response to Plasmodiophora brassicae pathotype 3A
